title: How to create items built in new client?
body: Is it possible to make custom items built like in the old clients? I found it is very useful for some champs to have that?

replies.body: http://lol.item-set.com/#!/editor will let you edit your sets and is pretty straightforward :)

At the moment the item sets feature is not available in the new client.
It could take quite some time for the item sets feature to appear in the new client.
See here
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h2q1
